hero.title: About Biubiustar
hero.subtitle: Connecting the World, Sharing Excellence - Building the Most Dynamic Social Media Platform

intro.title: Company Introduction
intro.description1: Biubiustar is a vibrant social media platform dedicated to providing users worldwide with the highest quality content sharing and social experience. We believe everyone has a unique story worth sharing, and every voice deserves to be heard.
intro.description2: Since our establishment, we have always adhered to a user-centric philosophy, continuously innovating and optimizing product features to create a more convenient, interesting, and secure social environment for users. Our team consists of outstanding talents from around the world, working together to drive the development of the social media industry.
intro.description3: Our platform supports various content formats, including text, images, videos, and more, allowing users to express themselves in the most natural way. We also prioritize user privacy protection and content security, ensuring every user can enjoy social fun in a healthy and positive environment.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Through innovative technology and thoughtful service, we connect global users, enabling everyone to freely share life, express opinions, and build connections, creating a more open, inclusive, and vibrant digital world together.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the world's leading social media platform, making Biubiustar an indispensable part of people's daily lives and creating unlimited possibilities and value for users.

2020.title: Project Launch
2020.description: The Biubiustar project was officially launched, the core team was established, and product concept design and technical architecture planning began.

2021.title: Product Development
2021.description: Completed core feature development, including user system, content publishing, social interaction and other basic modules, and conducted internal testing.

2022.title: Beta Release
2022.description: Released the Beta test version, invited seed users to participate in testing, collected feedback and continuously optimized the product experience.

2023.title: Official Launch
2023.description: The platform officially launched, began providing services to the public, user numbers grew rapidly, and the community ecosystem was gradually established.

2024.title: Global Expansion
2024.description: Launched internationalization strategy, supported multilingual services, expanded overseas markets, and became a globally influential social platform.

contact.title: Contact Us
